parameters.name: Content
parameters.description: The Base64-encoded content of the error page. The content type is specified by the Content-Type field.

parameters.name: ContentType
parameters.description:
The Content-Type field in the HTTP header. Valid values:

*   text/html
*   application/json

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The description of the custom error page.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: The ID of the custom error page, which can be obtained by calling the [ListPages](~~2850223~~) operation.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the custom error page.
